sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"希望"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: desire, wish, hope, expect, want, long
means: desire ： 语气较正式庄重，着重渴望的力量与热切，常含有强烈的意图和目的。
wish ： 语气较弱，多指难于实现或不可能实现的愿望。
hope ： 指对愿望实现有一定信心的希望。
expect ： 通常指有很大程度的把握，但仍含有预料之意，或预计某事或某行动的发生。
want ： 一般指所想要的东西是切望得到的东西，能弥补实际需要。
long ： 语气强，指极殷切地盼望着，这种盼望侧重于很难或不可能得到的东西。有时也指一般愿望，但含一定感情色彩。

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.cn: 她预料无法通过考试。

means.word_mean: 认为(某事)会发生; 认为(某人)会来; 预计

sentences.en: I expect a storm.
sentences.cn: 我预计会有一场暴风雨。

means.word_mean: 理应得到; 期望, 期待; 期盼

sentences.en: We expect writers to produce more and better works.
sentences.cn: 我们期望作家们写出更多更好的作品。

means.word_mean: 猜想; 认为某事是真实的

sentences.en: I expect (that) you are tired from the trip.
sentences.cn: 我想你旅途劳顿了吧。

means.word_mean: 期望，希望，指望；认为…必要；认为…理应得到(from，of)

sentences.en: Parents usually expect too much of their children.
sentences.cn: 父母通常都对子女寄予过大希望。

sentences.en: Jack and Mary expect their second very soon.
sentences.cn: 杰克和玛丽期待着第二个孩子的降生。

sentence.cn: 昨天我去了那里，但是没有我预期的好。
sentence.en: I went there yesterday and it is not as good as I expected.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

sentence.cn: 摩尔对她的生意有什么期望？。
sentence.en: What does Moore expect from her business?
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 题设

expand_knowledge_list.cn: 预期的；预料的；expect的过去分词

lj.lj_ly: he had a few lines about the eyes, but at forty-seven that was only to be expected.
lj.lj_ls: 他两眼周围有一些皱纹，不过四十七岁的人了，这也是正常的。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to emphasize that there was nothing unexpected about a person or event, however disappointed one might be

entry.def: If you expect something to happen, you believe that it will happen.

example.ex: ...a council workman who expects to lose his job in the next few weeks...
example.tran: 预计自己在接下来的几周里会丢掉工作的市政工人

example.ex: They no longer expect corporate profits to improve...
example.tran: 他们不再期待公司利润会增长。

entry.def: If you are expecting something or someone, you believe that they will be delivered to you or come to you soon, often because this has been arranged earlier.

example.ex: I am expecting several important letters but nothing has arrived...
example.tran: 我正在等几封重要的信件，可是一封都没到。

entry.def: If you expect something, or expect a person to do something, you believe that it is your right to have that thing, or the person's duty to do it for you.
entry.tran: 要求；认为应当得到;指望

example.tran: 他没有指望我们会盛情款待。

example.ex: I do expect to have some time to myself in the evenings...
example.tran: 我确实希望晚上能有些属于自己的时间。

entry.def: If you tell someone not to expect something, you mean that the thing is unlikely to happen as they have planned or imagined, and they should not hope that it will.

example.ex: You cannot expect to like all the people you will work with...
example.tran: 不要指望你会喜欢所有和你共事的人。

entry.def: If you say that a woman is expecting a baby, or that she is expecting, you mean that she is pregnant.
You say 'I expect' to suggest that a statement is probably correct, or a natural consequence of the present situation, although you have no definite knowledge.

example.ex: I expect you can guess what follows...
example.tran: 我想你能猜出接下来发生了什么。

entry.def: You can say 'What can you expect?' or 'What do you expect?' to emphasize that there is nothing surprising about a situation or a person's behaviour, especially if you find this disappointing.
entry.tran: 你还想指望什么；那有什么大惊小怪的

example.ex: It tastes artificial, but at that price what can you expect?...
example.tran: 尝起来像是假的，但是就这个价格你还想指望什么？

example.ex: If a guy hunts and owns guns, what do you expect?
example.tran: 如果一个人打猎而且还有自己的枪，你还想指望什么？

means.word_mean: 1. regard something as probable or likely;

sentences.sentence: "The meteorologists are expecting rain for tomorrow"
"We require our secretary to be on time"
"Aren't we asking too much of these children?"
"I expect my students to arrive in time for their lessons"

means.word_mean: 3. look forward to the probable occurrence of;

sentences.sentence: "We were expecting a visit from our relatives"
"I'm expecting a full explanation as to why these files were destroyed"
"The are expecting another child in January"

means.word_mean: 6. look forward to the birth of a child;

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'defer action, wait'): from Latin exspectare 'look out for', from ex- 'out' + spectare 'to look' (frequentative of specere 'see')

sentences.cn: 预计这个报告会提出一些重大的改革。
sentences.en: It is expected that the report will suggest some major reforms.

sentences.cn: 等待某人的来访 / 电话 / 来信
sentences.en: to expect a visit/call/letter from sb

sentences.cn: 你在等客人吗？
sentences.en: Are you expecting visitors?

sentences.cn: 我们昨天一直在等他。
sentences.en: We were expecting him yesterday.

sentences.cn: 我们一直盼望着他昨天到达。
sentences.en: We were expecting him to arrive yesterday.

sentences.cn: 她的父母对她的期望很高。
sentences.en: Her parents expected high standards from her.

sentences.cn: 你清楚大家对你的期望吗？
sentences.en: Are you clear what is expected of you?

sentences.cn: 我回过头去，想着可能看到有人跟着我。
sentences.en: I looked back, half expecting to see someone following me.

sentences.cn: 预计房价会急剧上涨。
sentences.en: House prices are expected to rise sharply.

sentences.cn: 我没想到他会成为一个成功的作家。
sentences.en: I didn't expect him to become a successful writer.

sentences.cn: 你真以为我会相信你吗？
sentences.en: Do you really expect me to believe you?

sentences.cn: 许多人预料和平谈判会破裂。
sentences.en: Many people were expecting (that) the peace talks would break down.

sentences.cn: 不要指望在几个月内就能学会一门外语。
sentences.en: You can't expect to learn a foreign language in a few months.

sentences.cn: 我们预计这个月食物价格会上涨。
sentences.en: We are expecting a rise in food prices this month.

sentences.cn: 休想得到我的同情！
sentences.en: Don't expect sympathy from me!

sentences.cn: 我不敢相信你竟有那样的行为！
sentences.en: That's not the sort of behaviour I expect of you!

sentences.cn: 别指望立即治愈。
sentences.en: Don't expect an instant cure...

sentences.cn: 不要指望你会喜欢所有和你共事的人。
sentences.en: You cannot expect to like all the people you will work with...

sentences.cn: 她又怀孕了。
sentences.en: She was expecting another baby...

sentences.cn: 我听说唐又怀孕了。
sentences.en: I hear Dawn's expecting again.

sentences.cn: 我想你能猜出接下来发生了什么。
sentences.en: I expect you can guess what follows...

sentences.cn: 我想你累了。
sentences.en: I expect you're tired...

sentences.cn: 尝起来像是假的，但是就这个价格你还想指望什么？
sentences.en: It tastes artificial, but at that price what can you expect?...

sentences.cn: 如果一个人打猎而且还有自己的枪，你还想指望什么？
sentences.en: If a guy hunts and owns guns, what do you expect?

sentences.cn: 我确实希望晚上能有些属于自己的时间。
sentences.en: I do expect to have some time to myself in the evenings...

sentences.cn: 预计自己在接下来的几周里会丢掉工作的市政工人
sentences.en: ...a council workman who expects to lose his job in the next few weeks...

sentences.cn: 他们不再期待公司利润会增长。
sentences.en: They no longer expect corporate profits to improve...

sentences.cn: 我正在等几封重要的信件，可是一封都没到。
sentences.en: I am expecting several important letters but nothing has arrived...

sentences.cn: 我没想到会有人来访。
sentences.en: I wasn't expecting a visitor...

sentences.cn: 他没有指望我们会盛情款待。
sentences.en: He wasn't expecting our hospitality...

sentences.cn: 他仍处于康复期，所以不要对他期望过高。
sentences.en: He's still getting over his illness, so don't expect too much from him.

sentences.cn: 他们期望自己所有的孩子都大有作为。
sentences.en: They expected all their children to be high achievers.

sentences.cn: 她的父母对她的期望很高。
sentences.en: Her parents expected high standards from her.

sentences.cn: 你清楚大家对你的期望吗？
sentences.en: Are you clear what is expected of you?

sentences.cn: 乔瓦尼·帕玛强尼是哈佛大学公众健康学院的生物统计学家，也是统计审査编委会专家组的成员。他说“他期望该委员会主要发挥某种咨询作用。”
sentences.en: Giovanni Parmigiani, a biostatistician at the Harvard School of Public Health, a member of the SBoRE group, says he expects the board to “play primarily an advisory role.

sentences.cn: 一个 CFL 不能只是简单地安装在白炽灯的灯具里，然后期望它能呈现褪色、朦胧和暗淡的视觉外观。
sentences.en: A CFL cannot be simply installed in an incandescent fixture and then expected to produce a visual appearance that is more than washed out, foggy, and dim.

sentences.cn: 如果你失去那样的机会, 你怎么能期望在比赛中获胜 呢 ?
sentences.en: If you give your chance away like that, how can you expect to win the game?

sentences.cn: 清教徒妇女期望能顺服自己的丈夫并专注于家务上.
sentences.en: Puritan women expected to submit to their husbands and to focus on homemaking as their career.

sentences.cn: 我们期望作家们写出更多更好的作品.
sentences.en: We expect writers to produce more and better works.

sentences.cn: 我们不能期望一个人一辈子养成的习惯短时期就能改变.
sentences.en: We can't expect one to change the habits of a lifetime in a short time.

sentences.cn: 但在近期可别期望能在商店的货价上看到一瓶瓶的犀牛汗出售.
sentences.en: But don't expect to see bottles of hippo sweat on the shop shelves any time soon.

sentences.cn: SETI中没人期望能截听到可辨识语言的问候.
sentences.en: No one from SETI is expecting to intercept a greeting in a recognizable language.

sentences.cn: 不要对他期望太大.
sentences.en: Do not expect too much of him.

sentences.cn: 阿南德基里说许多人 —— 如果不是所有人的话——被期望在这10天中开悟.
sentences.en: Many, if not most , were expected to become enlightened in this 10 days process, said Anandagiri.

sentences.cn: 期望所有机器人是本着公平比赛的精神设计的.
sentences.en: It is expected that all robots will be built with Rules 3.8 and 4.11 in mind.

sentences.cn: 我期望他们尽责工作.
sentences.en: I expect them to do their duties.

sentences.cn: 我不期望能在九月前听到他的消息.
sentences.en: I don't expect to hear from him till September.

sentences.cn: 你对她的期望太大了.
sentences.en: You are expecting too much of her.

sentences.cn: 公司展望可以提供在未来几个季度零售商期望看到的经济复苏程度.
sentences.en: Company outlooks could provide signs of how much recovery retailers expect to see in upcoming quarters.

sentences.cn: 他们对待仆人不坏, 但期望他们时时安分守己.
sentences.en: They treated their servants well, but expected themalways to know their place.

sentences.cn: 证据表明, 你对外界期望些什么, 你就很可能得到什么.
sentences.en: What you expect from the world, the evidence suggests, is what you're likely to get.

sentences.cn: 无论何时一家公司借入资金, 这一行为就提高了其股票的beta ( 和期望回报率 ).
sentences.en: Whenever a company borrows money, it increases the beta ( and the expected return ) of its stock.

sentences.cn: 我们期望加速贸易, 交流人员, 以至最终建立外交关系.
sentences.en: We expected to accelerate trade, the exchange of persons, and eventually diplomacy.

sentences.cn: 如果你期望成功的话,你就不能违犯商业规则.
sentences.en: You can't fly in the face of business rules and expect to be successful.

sentences.cn: 不要期望他人对你的幸福和成功负责.
sentences.en: Don't expect others to be responsible for your happiness and your success.

sentences.cn: 不要对我期望太高. 我需要时间接受这一新思想.
sentences.en: Don't expect too much of me. I need time to come around to this new idea.

sentences.cn: 一个特定的风格不可能出现后期望它一直留在顶端.
sentences.en: A particular style can't emerge and expect to stay at the top indefinitely.

sentences.cn: 人们期望联合国强烈谴责这种行为.
sentences.en: The United Nations is expected to strongly condemn such action.

sentences.cn: 以期望把道德心理中健康向上、具有勃勃生机的成分融入德育之中.
sentences.en: Thus the healthy and vigorous constituent is expected to add to moral education.

sentences.cn: 作者将期权引入了易逝品订购之中,以最大化期望收益为目标, 给出了易逝品最优订购数量.
sentences.en: And by the objective of maximizing of expected revenue, the optimal ordering quantity was given.

sentences.cn: 许多人预料和平谈判会破裂。
sentences.en: Many people were expecting (that) the peace talks would break down.

sentences.cn: 预料很快就会出现逃亡者.
sentences.en: The escapee's turnup is expected soon.

sentences.cn: 正如所预料的那样, 过度地饮酒最终毁了他.
sentences.en: As expected, excessive drinking caught up with him.

sentences.cn: 乔治? 布什再次赢得总统大选,这是很多人没有预料到的.
sentences.en: That George W . Bush won the presidency again was what many people hadn't expected.

sentences.cn: 她预料无法通过考试.
sentences.en: She expects to fail the exam.

sentences.en: We expect to close out the balance of you consignment in the next few days.

sentences.en: They must stop the expected surplus from landing on the market.

sentences.en: Across geographic gradients, Levins expects allopatric races or coenospecies exist.

sentences.en: Expecting the compliment to be followed with a criticism.

sentences.en: His management team can expect trouble from South Korea's aggressive unions along the way.

sentences.en: Disaster may not be as imminent as everyone expects.

sentences.en: You don't expect to hear such bad language from the gentle sex.

sentences.en: This is expected to increase to 237000 by the turn of the century.

sentences.cn: 这次旅行花的时间比我预料的要长.
sentences.en: My trip took me longer time than I expected.

sentences.cn: 它对我完全是件意外的事; 我未预料到,甚至未曾想到.
sentences.en: It was a complete surprise to me, I wasn't expecting and hadn't even thought of it.

sentences.en: And Jackson and his agent is expected to attend the press conference.

sentences.en: We hadn't expected them to counterattack so soon.

sentences.en: The young man looked at her as if he expected that she would weep or swoon.

sentences.en: As one might expect, the two approaches are very different from each other.

sentences.en: It cost less money than I expected.

sentences.en: One day , after her first week's rehearsal, what she expected came openly to the surface.

sentences.cn: 他们的成功出乎一切预料.

sentences.cn: 他们到得比我们预料的要早.
sentences.en: They came earlier than we had expected.

sentences.en: The day became dusk a lot sooner than we expected.

sentences.en: I expect to be paid promptly for the work.

sentences.en: I expect you to be punctual.

sentences.en: We still fall far short of what the Party expects of us.

sentences.en: Society has a right to expect obedience of the law.

sentences.en: As a demanding boss, he expected total loyalty and dedication from his employees.

sentences.cn: 他被他们对工作的高品质的要求吓倒了.
sentences.en: He was daunted by the high quality of work they expected.

sentences.cn: 那是我对你的最低要求.
sentences.en: That was the least I expected of you.

sentences.cn: 我们得定一下基本规则,以便让每个人都知道要求如何.
sentences.en: Let's establish the ground rules so that everybody knows what to expect.

sentences.en: Then she notices Kate and understands what is expected of her.

sentences.en: Leaders are expected to have the will and ability to defeat an enemy.

sentences.cn: 一如往常, 他要求一个完善的理由来支持你的建议.
sentences.en: As always, he expects a sound justification to back up your recommendation.

sentences.cn: 这远远低于人们曾预期的电视交互式广告可创造的数十亿美元的价值。

sentences.en: The climate system has so far behaved as one would expect it to.

sentences.cn: 还有,我们预期希拉力现在已经在做进入白宫的准备了.
sentences.en: Oh and we expected that by now Hillary Clinton would be heading for the White House.

sentences.cn: 偏离预期的行为会激怒他人或使他人警觉.
sentences.en: Individual deviation in expected behavior causes arousal or alertness in others.

sentences.cn: 生活在大学并不像我们的预期那样令人满意.
sentences.en: Life in the university is not as satisfactory as what we had expected.

sentences.cn: 链接行为与预期不符破坏了用户对他们自己的系统的理解.
sentences.en: Links that don't behave as expected undermine users'understanding of their own system.

sentences.cn: 可以预期偶氮甲烷分子具有和丙酮 ( CH3 ) 2CO分子相似的丫形结构.
sentences.en: One might expect azomethane to have a Y structure similar to that of acetone ( CH 3 ) 2 CO.

sentences.cn: 该股票在一个合理的13倍预期.
sentences.en: The trades at a reasonable 13 times expected earnings.

sentences.cn: 测试字符串变量的内容,并只接受预期值.
sentences.en: Test the content of string variables and accept only expected values.

sentences.cn: 重要的是确信你实际测试了防火墙的预期行为.
sentences.en: All that really matters is making sure you actually test the expected behavior of your firewalls.

sentences.cn: 与预期相吻合, 热传导率的大小取决于气流的制冷率.
sentences.en: As expected, the heat transfer rate depends on the cooling capacity rate of air.

sentences.cn: 感染疟疾者的总人数预期达到两千万人.
sentences.en: The total number of people infected with malaria was expected to reach 20 million.

sentences.cn: 她预期在一月份分娩.
sentences.en: She is expecting a baby in January.

sentences.cn: 他们不再期待公司利润会增长。
sentences.en: They no longer expect corporate profits to improve...

sentences.cn: 在当今的经济环境下，那些抱怨资金缺乏的社会科学家不应期待更多（资金）。
sentences.en: Social scientists who complain about a lack of funding should not expect more in today’s economic climate.

sentences.cn: 尽管参与者并没有期待会有一次积极体验,但当他们完成实验后,“没有一个人声称自己感到尴尬”。
sentences.en: Though the participants didn't expect a positive  experience, after they went through with the experiment, "not a single person  reported having been embarrassed."

sentences.cn: 人们期待士兵以毫不犹豫的忠诚跟随其将领.
sentences.en: Soldiers are expected to follow their leader with unquestioning loyalty.

sentences.cn: 人们期待这座桥在明年四月能完工.
sentences.en: It is expected that the bridge will have been completed by next April.

sentences.cn: 因此期待各组对于该额外课题提供观点.
sentences.en: Therefore, each team is expected to a point of view on this additional topic.

sentences.cn: 他们正在期待一包来自南非的贵重钻石.
sentences.en: They were expecting a valuable parcel of diamonds from South Africa.

sentences.cn: 正处于鼎盛期的美国重视并期待每个人担负起自己的责任.
sentences.en: America, at its best , is a place where personal responsibility is valuessd and expected.

sentences.cn: 但在现实中, 它们的经营业绩并没有人们期待的那么理想.
sentences.en: In fact, the business performance is not so perfect as expected.

sentences.cn: 克里斯: 你期待发生紧急情况 吗 ?
sentences.en: Chris: Are you expecting an emergency?

sentences.cn: 同时,美铝期待成为中国 -- 世界上经济成长最迅速国家的一个积极参与者.
sentences.en: Alcoa Expects to be an active participant in China, the fastest growing economy in the world.

sentences.cn: 他期待他的付出能够有所回报.
sentences.en: He expected his contribution to be repaid with interest.

sentences.cn: 如果你的侧翼包抄进行的很顺利, 是因为敌人正期待着你从侧翼接近他们.
sentences.en: If your flank march is going well, the enemy expects you to outflank him.

sentences.cn: 费斯切拉期待着一个艰难的开始,以迫使印度的2009年锦标赛本周末的银石赛道.
sentences.en: Giancarlo Fisichella is expecting a difficult start to Force India's 2009 championship this weekend.

sentences.cn: 期待别人给你不愿望给予的东西是不公平的.
sentences.en: It is unfair to expect something that you are not willing to give.

sentences.cn: 我们期待你作出决定.
sentences.en: We are expecting you to make a decision.

sentences.cn: 我们满心期待一桩最有利的婚姻.
sentences.en: We fully expect a most advantageous marriage.

sentences.cn: 连云港驰宇是您(们)的最佳选择, 我们期待着和您(们)的愉快合作.
sentences.en: Chiyulyg is at your service. We are expecting to have a good cooperation with you.

sentences.cn: 你也有此期待, 现在你是否同意, 是否同意?
sentences.en: You'd expect the same, now wouldn't you, wouldn't you?

sentences.cn: 如此以来, 学生还能学到什么, 家长还能期待什么,国家发展 怎么办 ?
sentences.en: All through this way, what can students study, what can parents expect the developing of country?

sentences.cn: 几乎每一讨论都会有意见不合的情形产生, 别期待全体一致,毫无异议.
sentences.en: In almost every discussion there is bound to be some disagreement, Don't expect unanimity.

sentences.cn: 期待神为你行动.
sentences.en: Expect God to move on your behalf.

sentences.cn: 我们正期待着你加入.
sentences.en: We are expecting you to join in.

sentences.cn: 实际上, 市场的趋势和我们想要的或期待的相反.
sentences.en: In fact, the market a trend in the opposite direction to what we want or expect.

sentences.cn: 作为全美第二大汽车制造商,福特公司期待此次出售能获得更多流动资金.
sentences.en: The sale deal is expected to free up cash for the No 2 US automaker.

sentences.cn: 我们这里有您的预约, 期待您4月2日到来.
sentences.en: We have your reservation here. Well be expecting you on the 2 nd of April.

sentences.cn: 期待处理一些重新安排时间的事或者是修订项目.
sentences.en: Expect to have to deal with rescheduling issues and revisions to projects.

sentences.cn: 她充满信心地期待着获胜.
sentences.en: She confidently expects to win.

sentences.cn: 你不能从他身上期待得分, 或者巨星的光辉什么的.
sentences.en: You cannot expect a scoring, flashy superstar from him.

sentences.cn: 所有的员工都期待每年薪水自然增长.
sentences.en: All the employee expect an automatic increase in pay every year.

sentences.cn: 她又怀孕了。
sentences.en: She was expecting another baby...

sentences.cn: 我听说唐又怀孕了。
sentences.en: I hear Dawn's expecting again.

sentences.cn: 我无意中透露了我已怀孕了.
sentences.en: I let It'slip that I was expecting a baby.

sentences.cn: 他的妻子当时正怀孕.
sentences.en: His wife was expecting.

sentences.cn: 当她怀孕时她的朋友为她组织了一场婴儿送礼会.
sentences.en: Her friends organized a baby shower for her when she was expecting.

sentences.cn: 韦德的妻子又怀孕了, 他们的大家庭要添新丁了.
sentences.en: Wade's wife is expecting again. They are going to have another child in the big family.

sentences.cn: 芭比一切都很顺利,她怀孕了在五月.
sentences.en: Jenny : Barb is doing so well. You know she is expecting in May.

sentences.cn: 都说怀孕的女人会容光焕发,看来这是真的!
sentences.en: It is true that a woman that is expecting is radiant.

sentences.cn: Chantelle告诉记者,当她发现自己好象怀孕后准备去社区医生(GP) 那里时真是太糟了.
sentences.en: Chantelle told how she discovered she was expecting after going to her GP with really bad?

sentences.cn: 我姐姐怀孕了。
sentences.en: My sister's expecting a baby .

sentences.cn: 我听说唐又怀孕了。
sentences.en: I hear Dawn's expecting again.

sentences.cn: 她又怀孕了。
sentences.en: She was expecting another baby.

Sentence.sentence: If you're training for a marathon, you wouldn't expect to turn up and just be able to run it.

Sentence.sentence: Furthermore, the future of the market looks far from rosy, with sales expected to fall further to £1.

Sentence.sentence: These findings are in agreement with what you would expect from the evolutionary theory: those who like to make friends and help others can gather enough resources to make it through tough times.

Sentence.sentence: It did not work out as well as was expected.

Sentence.sentence: Americans are less doubtful when it comes to politics: 73% expect to see a female president in their lifetime.

Sentence.sentence: And we expect this will have a huge impact on obesity.

Sentence.sentence: Broadly the same holds for the UK, Germany, France, Italy and Canada, and for Japan 50% of 2007 babies can expect to live to 107.

Sentence.sentence: Lawrence Hajna, spokesman for the State Department of Environmental Protection, said officials expect the bear to make it through next winter.

Sentence.sentence: Psychologists have shown that babies apparently expect their world to comply with the laws of physics and cause and effect as early as two months of age.
